reviews.name: Th√†nh Trung D∆∞∆°ng
reviews.review:
CGV Vincom Xuan Khanh is the ideal place to enjoy blockbuster movies in a modern and comfortable space. Located in Vincom Xuan Khanh shopping center, the theater is easy to find and convenient for combining movie watching, shopping and dining.

The theater has many spacious, clean screening rooms, equipped with a vivid Dolby sound system, a large, sharp screen and soft seats, creating a comfortable feeling even if you sit and watch a movie for several hours. In particular, the seats are arranged scientifically, making every viewing angle clear without being obscured.

The popcorn counter is rich with diverse combos, crispy and fragrant popcorn. The service staff is quick, cheerful and provides dedicated customer support. The theater also regularly has attractive promotions such as ticket discounts for students or incentives when booking tickets online.

With good service quality, CGV Vincom Xuan Khanh deserves to be a familiar destination for movie enthusiasts in Can Tho. Come and experience now!

reviews.name: Nguy·ªÖn Ho√†n M·ªπ
reviews.review:
If I had a 0-star rating, I would send it to the theater for my bad experience yesterday!
- Specifically, at 9:24 PM on November 27, 2024 (with information on the ticket), me and my friend (2 people) entered the theater to buy tickets at the counter, we bought 2 Linh Mieu tickets for the 9:30 show. PM and include 1 corn and 1 drink (I told the Staff the same thing); At first, you also asked us if eating corn tasted like anything. I also told you that I ate regular corn (EMPLOYED THAT FROM THE FIRST I SAID REGULAR CORN), then I looked at the order screen and it showed 1. What kind of COMBO (COMBO with a picture of this and that costs 200 or so) and she said 1 corn of cheese? I told my friend that I would only take 1 regular coke and 1 regular corn. At this time, when he received the order, he continued to press another COMBO (140 or 160, I don't remember), so I asked again. The friend asked again: "Sister, how much is 1 corn and 1 drink?", she answered me "122k", then she clicked on the screen which combo is 109k with 1 snack package as shown in the picture (while just now you answered me it was 122k? üòá), at this point I was also very upset and didn't want to talk anymore so I accepted the payment and went to the theater to watch the movie because it was almost there. now. At first, I just thought it was because of work that you had to be like that, so from the beginning, when I wasn't asked by the staff first and automatically pressed the combo in a drink cup of this or that shape, I didn't say anything and asked my friend. give me 1 regular popcorn but 5 times 7 times you force me into another combo and even deliberately give me cheese popcorn when from the beginning I said to use regular flavor?
- I know that the company also has requirements and you are all carefully trained to push these Extra Combos, but this will be something that makes customers very unhappy, because they feel they are not respected. , deceiving customers and also a contemptuous attitude toward customers. I also work in the F&B industry and I also know what it's like to run a service. If the company wants to promote sales, instead of intentionally forcing customers like that, they should use another strategy to call customers, not force them to work. Employees must run KPIs every day like that.
- My experience yesterday was very unsatisfactory. I hope the theater will contact us to resolve it and receive a satisfactory apology. I love going to the movies but have never felt so uncomfortable!!!

CGV Vincom Xuan Khanh Cinema, located on the 5th floor, in Vincom Shopping Center No. 209, 30/4 Street, Xuan Khanh Ward, Ninh Kieu District, City. Can Tho.

Overall, 5 stars, no complaints.
Everyone should come here to experience it.

reviews.review:
This is the first time reviewing this place. I often come here but I always visit outside stores like Gongcha or Hot & Cold.
Location: located on April 30 street opposite Tran Van Hoai street, this is where the tallest building in Can Tho is located, so if you run on the street you will see it immediately.
Space: this place is quite large, it seems to have 5 floors and 3 basements so it's very spacious, there are enough stalls in this supermarket.
I like the 4th floor the most because there are many shops on that floor.
In the past few days, this place has organized an event to promote the Samsung Galaxy S9 phone and found it quite crowded, so I went to try it out. I recognized that this place is located on a main road, so I invited a famous singer to sing at night. It's so exciting, and from morning to afternoon, there are games to receive prizes and that's quite interesting and attractive. This Vincom space is extremely spacious so it's comfortable without having to jostle around. , inside the big shopping center to shop too

reviews.name: Minh M·∫´n
reviews.review: I'm so frustrated when I don't receive Doraemon's A3 poster at CGV Vinh Long. You can't do that. I'll tell you every detail of the process: At 11:45 a.m., we were at the cgv cinema and at that time I bought 3 tickets online and when I bought them, I was given 3 publications and 1 Doraemon a3 poster, but the staff only gave me 3 publications but no poster. At first, I thought I had finished watching the movie. But when I finished watching and asked the staff, the staff said it was all gone, but at that time I went in first and didn't have a POS while the person who came in later to watch the show and sat near me had one. I didn't understand and I went out to ask the staff why the other guy came in after me and had a POS that I didn't have. What's the strange business? At first, on the table, I saw a lot of POS showing at 11:50, but the staff didn't give it to me, only 3 copies. So what's wrong? Where is my post? I went out to ask again and they said everything. Meanwhile, everyone has a post but I don't. Why is that? I'm the one who came in quite early. Before the movie started, I went in but didn't have time to come out so I told them all. Then the staff at first didn't give me the post. I asked the manager of cgv to immediately reprimand the ticket counter staff for my mistake. At first I didn't want to be scandalized, but because the staff made me so angry, that's why it happened. out this incident!

Vincom Hung Vuong - Can Tho

reviews.review:
Seeing people criticize so much is a bit bitter, but seeing that the ticket price is cheaper than the surrounding shops, I decided to try it!!!
In my opinion:
1. The restaurant's dishes are diverse, the line counter has many dishes, always changing so everyone can enjoy. In particular, there are many delicious dipping sauces for everyone to choose from. There are not many grilled dishes, but the quality is good, the meat marinade is rich in flavor, and the meat is fresh and delicious.
The hot pot is seasoned to taste, the topping is a bit small (you can order more).
The dining area is clean and airy.
Second. The service staff is quick, cute, and enthusiastic with customers. Always care, smile at customers, ask customers what to use to prepare dishes continuously.
The manager is also enthusiastic and cute, often chatting with customers to ask how they feel about the food. Is it true that the manager is a bit fat and ugly? I asked for his info so I could take him out to eat for free, kk.
=> Good restaurant, clean, lots of food, fresh management, friendly staff always greet customers when entering and leaving. Will support the restaurant for a long time

A central supermarket
Send motorbike 2k
If you buy items inside, parking is free.
Luxury store

Located in the Life Style shopping center chain of Vietnamese people, VinDS Fashion is a fashion shopping center designed and displayed according to international standards, with hundreds of prestigious fashion brands such as New Look, Principles, The Collections Debenhams, Redherring, Funkyfish, Antix, OnOff, Marc, Canifa,... VinDS Fashion converges all fashion styles, from elegant, seductive to dynamic, youthful, modern for all ages such as office fashion, Children's fashion, street fashion...

RICH WORLD OF CUISINE
The culinary world is extremely rich on the 3rd, 4th and 5th floors with popular restaurant systems such as: Kichi-Kichi, Gogi House, Thai BBQ, Grill & Cheers, Crystal Jade, 2!Yummy... promising to be a daily destination for families to enjoy the unique and diverse flavors of countries around the world.

VINMART CONSUMER SUPERMARKET
VinMart consumer supermarket with a scale of more than 2,000 square meters serves 100% of the essential needs of every family every day. VinMart offers consumers a diverse choice of goods, competitive prices, clear origin and guaranteed quality. In addition, VinMart is also the exclusive supermarket system providing clean agricultural products under the VinEco brand.

Officially opened on July 26, 2015, Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong, Can Tho is the first shopping mall in the Mekong Delta region, opening a new world of consumption and improving the lives of people here.
Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong, Can Tho is located on two sides adjacent to Hung Vuong and Cach Mang Thang Tam streets with luxurious, modern architecture. The total floor area of the shopping center is up to 18,000 m2, including 5 floors and 1 basement serving thousands of visitors every day.

DIVERSE LUXURY BRANDS

Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong, Can Tho has a full range of products from fashion, accessories, cosmetics, furniture to cuisine... The fashion world area has the presence of prestigious brands such as Sabina, Emigo, JMG, Samsonite,... will bring great fashion experiences to Can Tho people.

VINMART SUPERMARKET

VinMart supermarket is over 1,200 m2 wide, providing a variety of products with competitive prices and guaranteed quality, serving 100% of every family's daily essential needs with the best quality and most competitive prices. .

reviews.name: H·∫£i Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review:
Today. I went to Vincom Hung Vuong Can Tho to watch the movie Kong Godzilla at 7:00 p.m.
The employee sold 3 tickets. Then asked if I could use corn with water. I replied "a big country with big corn". The staff said that with this combo, the water will be in a plastic cup, 1 coke will be given, and then charged 463,000 VND. At this point, I found the price to be expensive, but I still paid because I don't watch movies often.
When I received the popcorn, I realized it was a Godzilla plastic cup.
After watching the movie, when I got home and checked the ticket price at this time frame the next day, 3 tickets, 1 large drink, 1 large corn were only 311,000 VND.

reviews.name: ƒê·ªá Nguy·ªÖn B√πi Ho√†ng
reviews.review:
Officially opened on July 26, 2015, Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong, Can Tho is the first shopping mall in the Mekong Delta region, opening a new world of consumption and improving the lives of people here.
Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong, Can Tho is located on two sides adjacent to Hung Vuong and Cach Mang Thang Tam streets with luxurious, modern architecture. The total floor area of the shopping center is up to 18,000 m2, including 5 floors and 1 basement serving thousands of visitors every day.
DIVERSE LUXURY BRANDS
Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong, Can Tho has a full range of products from fashion, accessories, cosmetics, furniture to cuisine... The fashion world area has the presence of prestigious brands such as Sabina, Emigo, JMG, Samsonite,... will bring great fashion experiences to Can Tho people.

VINMART SUPERMARKET
VinMart supermarket is over 1,200 m2 wide, providing a variety of products with competitive prices and guaranteed quality, serving 100% of every family's daily essential needs with the best quality and most competitive prices. .

RICH WORLD OF CUISINE
The culinary world area located on the 4th and 5th floors brings the quintessence of Japanese, Korean, European and American cuisine,... and flavors of the three regions of Vietnam with big brands to the people for the first time. Can Tho such as Highlands Coffee, King BBQ, Daruma, Gogi House, Jollibee, Kichi Kichi,...

VINPRO ELECTRICAL MACHINERY CENTER
VinPro electronics center on the 3rd floor provides phones, tablets, laptops, electronics, refrigeration, household appliances and accessories from famous brands in the world with after-sales service. Always attentive to technology enthusiasts.

CGV CINEMA
The famous CGV cinema complex is invested in a surround sound system that creates multi-dimensional Dolby Surround 7.1 effects, giving audiences realistic and vivid footage, in accordance with international cinema standards. Besides the modern cinema room, the lobby at the theater complex with retro design style and the Popcorn Factory area will definitely satisfy customers while waiting to enjoy the movie.

THE FIRST NATURAL ICE ROUND IN CAN THO
The first natural ice rink in the city - Vinpearlland Ice Rink Can Tho is where young people can experience artistic sports that are specialties of the cold country such as ice skating, hockey...
